item.title: Blake Lively sues Justin Baldoni for sexual harassment, his team denies accusation: ‘Desperate attempt to fix her negative reputation’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Blake Lively Sues Justin Baldoni for Sexual Harassment, His Team Denies Accusation

Date: Saturday, [Date not specified]   Source: The Indian Express

Blake Lively has filed a lawsuit against Justin Baldoni, the director of It Ends With Us, for allegations of sexual harassment, claiming emotional distress caused to her family.

  • Lively alleges Baldoni attempted to mount a smear campaign against her.
  • Reported demands included restrictions on discussions about nudity and personal topics.
  • Baldoni's team has denied these allegations as false and a desperate attempt to rehabilitate Lively's image.
  • The lawsuit includes accusations of social manipulation by Baldoni.
  • Lively's husband, Ryan Reynolds, was allegedly involved in discussions regarding the claims during production.
“It is shameful that Ms Lively and her representatives would make such serious and categorically false accusations against Mr. Baldoni...”

In summary, the legal battle highlights tensions from the film's production and exposes allegations of misconduct and reputational damage within Hollywood.

item.title: Radhika Merchant Shines in a Chic Loro Piana Co-Ord Set At Dhirubhai Ambani School Annual Day - News18
item.description:
Radhika Merchant Shines in a Chic Loro Piana Co-Ord Set At Dhirubhai Ambani School Annual Day

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: News18

Radhika Merchant made a stylish appearance at the Dhirubhai Ambani International School’s annual day celebration, showcasing a blend of luxury and casual elegance.

  • She wore a chambray blue co-ord set from Loro Piana including a button-down shirt priced at ₹1,32,556 and matching trousers priced at ₹1,22,406.
  • Accessories included an Hermès belt, Bolide crossbody bag, and Himalaya Niloticus Crocodile Oran sandals, completing her chic look.
  • The event featured a star-studded guest list with notable personalities like Shah Rukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, and others.
  • Radhika's minimal yet radiant beauty choices complemented her outfit, showcasing her elegant style.
"With her effortlessly chic co-ord set, Radhika showcased how to perfectly blend casual elegance with luxury."

This event not only highlighted Radhika Merchant's fashion sense but also celebrated a grand gathering of the Ambani family and Bollywood stars.

item.title: Katrina Kaif reveals anecdotes about her life with Vicky Kaushal: 'Even now, my husband asks me to...' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Katrina Kaif reveals anecdotes about her life with Vicky Kaushal: 'Even now, my husband asks me to...'

Publication Date: December 9, 2024

Source: Times of India

Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal, marking their third wedding anniversary, share light on balancing their personal and professional lives in a recent interview.

  • Katrina discusses her demanding careers and how it affects their relationship.
  • She highlights the differences between her acting profession and running a business.
  • Vicky encourages her to focus on personal moments over work commitments.
  • The couple enjoyed a romantic getaway to celebrate their anniversary.
  • Katrina shared glimpses of their vacation on social media.
“Even now, my husband asks me to put down the phone, and I want to send just one more email.” - Katrina Kaif

The couple balances their love life with their busy careers, with Katrina awaiting her next film, while Vicky has an exciting lineup ahead.

item.title: Josh Heuston says ‘queen’ Tabu ‘fed and kept him alive’ on sets of Dune Prophecy. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Josh Heuston says ‘queen’ Tabu ‘fed and kept him alive’ on sets of Dune Prophecy

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent behind-the-scenes clip, Josh Heuston praises his co-star Tabu for her kindness and support during the filming of the web series Dune: Prophecy, highlighting the bond they formed off-screen.

  • Tabu debuts as Sister Francesca in episode 5 of Dune: Prophecy.
  • Heuston plays her son, Constantine Corrino, in the series.
  • He shares how Tabu brought him authentic Indian dishes, which strengthened their rapport.
  • Fans reacted positively to Heuston's tribute to Tabu on social media.
  • Dune: Prophecy is set 10,000 years before the events of the Dune films.
“Tabu used to, like, hang out with me at the front of the trailer. And she’d bring me, like, authentic Indian dishes to set every day. So we kind of built a little bit of rapport because she kept me alive and fed me.” - Josh Heuston

This affectionate gesture from Tabu has not only endeared her to fans but also highlights the camaraderie on set, contributing to a positive atmosphere during filming.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office: Most-Watched Film Of 2024 Is Now Only 0.5 Million Tickets Away From Breaking KGF Chapter 2’s Record On BookMyShow! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office: Most-Watched Film Of 2024 Is Now Only 0.5 Million Tickets Away From Breaking KGF Chapter

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun led Pushpa 2: The Rule has surpassed massive box office records and is poised to become the highest-grossing film in India in all languages. Today, it is reported as the most-watched film of 2024 on BookMyShow.

Key Points:

  • Pushpa 2 has registered 16.5 million ticket sales, making it the highest on BookMyShow.
  • Currently only 0.5 million tickets away from KGF Chapter 2's record of 17 million.
  • It has drawn 10.8 lacs solo viewers, surpassing other films like Stree 2 and Kalki 2898 AD.
  • Box office earnings reach 1020.75 crores in India with 645 crores from Hindi.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“Pushpa 2 is unstoppable and will soon cross that milestone as well.”

Conclusion:

Pushpa 2's remarkable performance signifies its strong audience engagement and potential to set new records in the industry.

item.title: Kareena and Saif invite Spider-Man and Iron Man to son Taimur’s birthday bash, Jeh flaunts his Batman tattoo; watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Taimur Ali Khan's Superhero Birthday Bash

Date: December 21, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Taimur Ali Khan celebrated his 8th birthday with a star-studded bash that included popular superhero characters.

  • Taimur's birthday party took place on December 20, with family and friends celebrating with him.
  • Special guests included performers dressed as Iron Man, Spider-Man, and Captain America.
  • Taimur's younger brother Jeh showcased a Batman tattoo at the party.
  • Fans shared mixed reactions, with some expressing concern for Taimur's safety during the superhero performances.
“What? Who lifts a kid like that?” - A concerned fan on social media.

Despite some worries, it seems Taimur had an enjoyable time celebrating with his superhero friends.

item.title: Mollywood’s most violent film takes a phenomenal opening at the box office - 123telugu
item.description:
Mollywood’s Most Violent Film Takes a Phenomenal Opening at the Box Office

Published on: Dec 21, 2024 6:00 pm IST

Malayalam film Marco, headlined by Unni Mukundhan, has had a phenomenal opening at the box office, making it the most significant release of the season.

  • The film garnered around Rs. 4.5 crores gross at the Kerala box office on opening day.
  • Despite being generally not frontloaded, Marco has exceptional opening numbers.
  • Worldwide, the film collected nearly Rs. 10 crores, with strong performance in the Gulf and other international markets.
  • The blockbuster second day is expected to yield shocking weekend numbers.
  • Other notable cast members include Jagadish, Siddique, and Yukti Thareja.
Trade experts believe that the movie would have achieved even bigger numbers in Kerala with more shows.

Overall, Marco has marked an impressive start, setting a new standard for Malayalam cinema.

item.title: Actor Govind Namdev clarifies viral post on dating 30-year-old Shivangi Verma - India Today
item.description:
Govind Namdev Clarifies Dating Rumors with Shivangi Verma

Published On: Dec 21, 2024 | Source: India Today

Veteran actor Govind Namdev has addressed rumors claiming he is in a romantic relationship with 30-year-old actress Shivangi Verma, which arose after a viral post.

  • Namdev shared a photo with Verma, leading to speculation about their relationship due to a caption that said, 'Love has neither any age nor any limit.'
  • He later clarified that the post was about their forthcoming film titled 'Gaurishankar Goharganj Wale'.
  • In his clarification, he stated that the storyline involves an old man falling in love with a young actress, and emphasized that he cannot fall in love again.
  • Namdev dedicated a poem to his wife, Sudha, to further dispel any speculations.
“This is not real life, this is reel life... As for me, to fall in love with a young or old person is not possible in this life.”

Govind Namdev, a seasoned actor from the National School of Drama, has been part of numerous films and TV shows, including the recent 'Sam Bahadur'.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' stampede: Allu Arjun was denied police permission, says Telangana CM Revanth Reddy - The Times of India
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' Stampede: Telangana CM States Allu Arjun Was Denied Police Permission

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy has stated that actor Allu Arjun did not receive police permission for the large gathering that resulted in a stampede during the promotional event of 'Pushpa 2'.

  • The Telangana Chief Minister reported that there were no police permissions granted for the event organized by Allu Arjun.
  • The stampede occurred due to overwhelming crowds, highlighting issues of crowd management and safety.
  • It raises concerns about event planning and the responsibilities of organizers in ensuring safety protocols.
“The responsibility for ensuring safety lies with the event organizers. Proper permissions were not obtained.”

This incident underscores the importance of adhering to safety regulations for large gatherings, particularly after recent events where safety lapses have led to tragic outcomes.

item.title: Boney Kapoor says his female following has increased after hair transplant; says, “Who doesn’t like female attention?” - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Boney Kapoor Shares Increased Female Following After Hair Transplant

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Producer Boney Kapoor recently spoke at a press conference about his hair transplant journey and how it has positively impacted his life.

  • Boney Kapoor revealed he underwent a hair transplant earlier this year.
  • He reported weight loss and improved physical condition since the procedure.
  • His female following has reportedly increased, as women now approach him for photos.
  • Kapoor mentioned other known figures like cricketers who have also benefited from hair transplants.
  • The filmmaker attended the press conference alongside Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 director Anees Bazmee, who recently had the same procedure.
  • His latest film, Maidaan, received positive reviews earlier this year.
“Who doesn’t like female attention? All in all, it has been a wonderful experience.”

This candid acknowledgment of his experience highlights the societal perceptions around appearance and confidence, especially in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Varun Dhawan reveals Lara has met Raha Kapoor; wants THIS film with Alia Bhatt to be his daughter’s first watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Reveals Daughter Lara Met Raha Kapoor; Picks a Film for Her First Watch

Date: Dec 21, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Varun Dhawan shared that his daughter, Lara, has met Alia Bhatt's daughter, Raha Kapoor. The two actors are currently exploring new projects together while discussing their growing families.

  • Varun and Alia have been popular onscreen pairs since their debut in 2012's Student of the Year.
  • Varun revealed that Lara and Raha have met, and he hopes they will become good friends.
  • He expressed a desire for Lara to watch Student of the Year as her first film, emphasizing it as an easy watch.
  • Varun is promoting his upcoming film Baby John, set to release on Christmas.
  • Alia is currently filming for Love & War alongside Ranbir Kapoor and Vicky Kaushal.
“I think still the first one which she could watch is Student Of The Year only. I think that would be the first one she could watch because it's a very easy watch for her to see.” - Varun Dhawan

The discussion around their children's future friendships and their own professional paths is a delightful glimpse into the lives of these Bollywood stars.

item.title: Shruti Haasan quit Adivi Sesh's Dacoit due to 'over-involvement of co-star' - India Today
item.description:
Shruti Haasan Exits Adivi Sesh's Dacoit Due to Creative Differences

Published On: Dec 21, 2024
Source: India Today

Shruti Haasan has exited Adivi Sesh's film Dacoit due to creative differences and scheduling conflicts, citing 'over-involvement of her co-star' as a significant reason for her departure.

  • Originally cast as the female lead, Shruti Haasan has been replaced by Mrunal Thakur.
  • Sources suggest that the exit was not due to date clashes but rather due to discomfort caused by her co-star's involvement in the project.
  • The film is about two estranged lovers who commit a series of robberies that transform their lives.
  • Shruti is also currently filming for another project directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj.
“The other actor was involved too much in the script, just like he does for his every film... It made the workplace uncomfortable for her.”

This exit highlights the challenges actors face in collaborative projects, particularly when creative differences arise.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 16: Allu Arjun’s Super Hit Is Now Battling Against HanuMan (Hindi) To Become 3rd Most Profitable Film Of 2024 - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 16: Allu Arjun’s Super Hit Battling Against HanuMan

Publication Date: (not specified) Source: Koimoi

It’s been a terrific run for Pushpa 2 Hindi at the Indian box office, dominating despite competition. As of day 16, it earned 12.50 crores net in Hindi.

Key Points

  • Day 16 collection: 12.50 crores; Total collection: 645 crores.
  • 10% drop on third Friday compared to the previous day.
  • Highest third Friday collection for a Hindi film, surpassing other hits.

Notable Quotes

“Pushpa 2 has already added ROI% of 222.5% in its kitty.”

Overall, Pushpa 2’s success indicates significant audience preference and strong box office performance.

item.title: Not Stree 2, Kalki 2898 AD, or Fighter, this south hit is 2024's most-watched Indian film, sold 31 lakh tickets in a day - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2: The Rule Becomes Most-Watched Indian Film of 2024

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

As 2024 comes to a close, the BookMyShow report reveals that Pushpa 2: The Rule has emerged as the most-watched Indian film of the year, selling a remarkable 31 lakh tickets on its opening day.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule has 10.8 lakh solo viewers.
  • The film grossed over ₹1500 crore worldwide.
  • It is directed by Sukumar and stars Allu Arjun, Fahadh Faasil, and Rashmika Mandanna.
  • The film set a record for the highest-opening by an Indian film.
  • November 1 saw sales of 2.3 million tickets in 24 hours.
“The most watched Indian film of 2024 has done a business of over ₹1500 crore worldwide.”

This film not only highlights the cinematic success of the year but also the changing trends in audience preferences, where big-budget blockbusters continue to dominate.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh’s glam show in full display in Bollywood - 123telugu
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh’s glam show in full display in Bollywood

Published on: Dec 21, 2024

Source: 123Telugu

Keerthy Suresh recently made news after her wedding and is now promoting her upcoming Hindi film, Baby John.

  • Recently married to Antony in a private ceremony in Goa.
  • Promoting her film Baby John, set for release on December 25, 2024.
  • Spotted in glamorous outfits that have made her popular in public discussions.
“Her latest glamorous appearances, especially after her wedding, have added a fresh glow to her.”

This period marks an exciting time for Keerthy Suresh as she transitions into Bollywood with her upcoming debut.

item.title: Shruti Exits Adivi Sesh's 'Dacoit' Over 'Work Conditions'.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Shruti Haasan Exits Adivi Sesh's 'Dacoit' Over 'Work Conditions'

Publication Date: Not specified. Source: Not specified.

Actress Shruti Haasan has stepped away from Adivi Sesh's upcoming project, "Dacoit," citing "uncomfortable work conditions" as the reason for her exit.

  • Shruti reportedly left the project due to discomfort with the working environment and over-involvement of a co-star.
  • Previously rumored reasons included scheduling conflicts with another project, but this was denied by sources close to her.
  • The shooting timeline faced issues, including repeated reshoots and changes in schedules.
  • Following her exit, Mrunal Thakur was announced as part of the cast for the film.
“Shruti, despite being interested in showcasing a new side to her acting, wasn't comfortable with the over-involvement of the co-star.”

The film, directed by Shaneil Deo, is described as an action-packed drama and includes Adivi Sesh and Mrunal Thakur as leads. Shruti Haasan continues to work on other projects including 'Coolie' and upcoming films with Prabhas.

item.title: Inside photos of Tamannaah Bhatia's lavish Mumbai home: Spacious living room, minimal décor, luxury car collection and more - India.com
item.description:
Inside Tamannaah Bhatia's Lavish Mumbai Home: A Glimpse into Luxury Living

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: India.com

Tamannaah Bhatia's luxurious Mumbai apartment features spacious living areas and minimal decor. The actress enjoys a contemporary lifestyle with high-end amenities.

  • Her apartment is located in Bayview Apartment, covering an area of 80,778 sq ft on the 14th floor.
  • Decor includes modern art and a beige long couch with marble flooring.
  • Her home is valued at around Rs 16 crores.
  • Tamannaah's kitchen includes modern facilities with a marble finish and grey tiles.
  • She owns several luxury cars, including a BMW 320i and a Mercedes-Benz GLE.
  • Her net worth is estimated to be around Rs 120 crores.
“Tamannaah is one of the sought after actresses in the industry.”

This stunning apartment showcases Tamannaah Bhatia's unique aesthetic and highlights her success in both her personal and professional life.

item.title: Rashmika Mandanna responds to being trolled for calling Vijay's Ghilli a remake of Mahesh Babu's Pokiri: ‘Sorry, my bad’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rashmika Mandanna Clarifies Misstatement on Ghilli and Pokiri

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Rashmika Mandanna mistakenly characterized Vijay’s film Ghilli as a remake of Mahesh Babu’s Pokiri. The actress quickly acknowledged her error after receiving feedback online.

  • Rashmika Mandanna confidently stated that Ghilli is a remake of Pokiri during an interview.
  • She discussed her admiration for actors Vijay and Trisha, recalling childhood experiences with their films.
  • Upon correction from fans, Mandanna admitted her mistake on social media, clarifying that Ghilli is a remake of Okkadu.
  • Rashmika has a busy schedule with upcoming projects in multiple languages, including Telugu and Hindi.
“Avunu..telusu sorry..okka booboo aipoindi.. interview ayipointarvata annukunna reyyyy ghilli is okkadu ra .. pokkiri is pokiri ani..social media lo ippudu estuntaaru ani.. sorry sorry my bad..” - Rashmika Mandanna

This amusing incident highlights the close scrutiny celebrities face on social media, and Mandanna's gracious acknowledgment of her error reinforces her relatable public persona.

item.title: Bigg Boss 8 Telugu’s controversial beauty ties the knot with boyfriend - 123telugu
item.description:
Bigg Boss 8 Telugu’s Controversial Beauty Ties the Knot with Boyfriend

Published on Dec 21, 2024, Source: 123telugu.com

Though Bigg Boss 8 Telugu has concluded, news about the show and its contestants continues to make headlines.

  • Soniya Akula, a controversial contestant, was eliminated in the third week.
  • She tied the knot with her long-time boyfriend, Yashpa, in a ceremony attended by the Bigg Boss 8 Telugu team.
  • Soniya is known for her controversies and has appeared in a few films.
  • After her marriage, she aims to move on from her past and embrace a new chapter of her life.
Soniya has finally settled down.

This wedding marks a significant moment for Soniya Akula, highlighting the ever-evolving narratives of reality TV stars.

item.title: From Sambhavna Seth to Dipika Kakar, Dimpy Ganguly and others: TV celebs who opened up their heartbreaking miscarriage stories - The Times of India
item.description:
From Sambhavna Seth to Dipika Kakar, Dimpy Ganguly and others: TV celebs who opened up their heartbreaking miscarriage stories

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Delhi Times

TV star Sambhavna Seth recently opened up about her miscarriage during her first trimester, sparking a discussion among several celebrities who shared their own heart-wrenching experiences.

  • Sambhavna Seth shared her emotional journey after losing her baby in the first trimester.
  • Ankita Bhargava revealed the pain of her miscarriage and the online trolling she faced after announcing her pregnancy.
  • Gunjan Manaktala discussed the impact of a miscarriage on her family's happiness and shared her husband's hurtful experience during Bigg Boss.
  • Dimpy Ganguly recounted the trauma of her miscarriage before becoming a mother of three.
  • Dipika Kakar expressed caution in announcing her second pregnancy after suffering a miscarriage previously.
  • Nisha Rawal opened up about her two miscarriages during a tumultuous relationship.
“For a long time, we’ve been going through this, and it has happened again.” - Avinash Dwivedi

These stories highlight the emotional toll of miscarriage and the support needed for public figures facing such personal tragedies.

item.title: Inside photos of Govinda's ultra-luxurious home in Mumbai worth Rs...: Enchanting views, vintage paintings, minimalistic furniture and more - India.com
item.description:
Inside the Luxurious Home of Govinda in Mumbai

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: India.com

Govinda lives in a beautiful multi-storeyed mansion located at Juhu Beach, Mumbai, in the prestigious Jal Darshan building.

  • The house features enchanting views and vintage paintings.
  • Minimalistic furniture enhances the aesthetic appeal.
  • Govinda's home reflects his vibrant personality.
  • The estimated value of the house is Rs 16 crore.
  • Several bedrooms offer a refreshing view of Juhu Beach.
"The vibe of Govinda's house is completely vintage."

Govinda's luxurious home stands as a testament to his success and unique character within Bollywood.

item.title: Tamannaah’s menacing look from Odela 2 out on her b’day - 123telugu
item.description:
Tamannaah’s menacing look from Odela 2 out on her b’day

Published on Dec 21, 2024 by 123telugu.com

Star heroine Tamannaah is celebrating her birthday today. On this special occasion, the makers of her upcoming film, Odela 2, unveiled a special poster featuring her in a menacing look dressed as a Naga Sadhu.

  • Odela 2 is highly anticipated and will be released on a pan-India scale.
  • Tamannaah is reportedly charging ₹4 crore for the role, making her one of the highest-paid actresses in Tollywood.
  • The film also stars Hebah Patel, Vasishta N Simha, and others.
  • Directed by Ashok Teja and produced under the Sampath Nandi Teamworks banner.
  • Music for the film is composed by Ajaneesh Loknath, known for his work in Kantara.
“Tamannaah's popularity has surged after her recent successes in Bollywood.”

Odela 2 promises to be a big event in the Telugu film industry, with a unique storyline and a talented cast.

item.title: Ankita Khare to QUIT Bhavika Sharma-Hitesh Bharadwaj starrer Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin - India Forums
item.description:
Ankita Khare to Exit 'Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin'

Published: Saturday, December 21, 2024 at 7:22 AM

Ankita Khare, known for her role as Harini in the popular show 'Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin', is set to leave the series.

  • Khare has reportedly decided to quit the show and has submitted her resignation.
  • The show has seen fluctuations in TRP ratings recently.
  • Current characters include Bhavika Sharma and Hitesh Bharadwaj, with Bharadwaj having replaced the previous actor after a generation leap.
  • Details about Khare's character's exit remain unclear, with possibilities for a natural conclusion.
“Yes, this is true. Ankita is planning on quitting the show soon and has apparently also put her papers.”

The change in cast raises questions about the future dynamics of the show and how it will impact its viewer engagement.

item.title: Viduthalai 2 Box Office Collection Day 1: Vijay Sethupathi & Soori’s Film Records 9th Biggest Opening For Kollywood In 2024 - Koimoi
item.description:
Viduthalai 2 Box Office Collection Day 1: Vijay Sethupathi & Soori’s Film Records 9th Biggest Opening

Publication Date: (Date not provided), Source: Koimoi

The highly anticipated Viduthalai 2 finally arrived in theatres yesterday. Starring Vijay Sethupathi and Soori in the lead roles, the film had a good start on its opening day.

  • Viduthalai 2 opened to positive reviews from critics praising its storytelling and strong performances.
  • The film registered a net collection of 7.10 crores on its first day.
  • It achieved an overall occupancy of around 40% in its Tamil version and 20% in Telugu.
  • The opening is significantly higher than its predecessor, which opened at 3.85 crores.
  • It recorded the 9th biggest opening for Kollywood in 2024.
“Viduthalai 2 registered the 9th biggest opening for Kollywood this year.”

This strong start positions Viduthalai 2 favorably in the competitive box office landscape, showcasing its potential for growth in the coming days.
